title: (dr-autosync)merge region hang for 28min after replication mode change from sync_recover to sync
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
cluster topo:
```
12 tikv, 6 in primary dc and 6 backup
primary dc: zone1: tikv1-peer and tikv7-peer zone2: tikv2-peer and tikv8-peer, zone3: tikv3peer and tikv9-peer
Backup dc: zone4: tikv4-peer/tikv10 zone5: tikv5/tikv11, zone7: tikv6/tikv12
Cluster data: 39G, 58 region
```

```
step 1. 2024/05/25 19:03:35 set max-store-down-time 5m
step 2. 2024/05/25 19:36:29 down tikv4/tikv5, make cluster switch to async mode
step 3. 2024/05/25 20:06:48 up tikv4/tikv5, yes cluster switch to sync_recovery mode
step 4. 2024/05/25 20:06:58 down tikv5
step 5. 2024/05/25 20:29:14 check down peer = 6
```

### What did you expect?
down peer should return to 0 at step 6.

### What did happened?
One region hang at merge region for 28minï¼Œ that's why it can't be added peer.
Check tikv (tikv8-peer) log, found the merge was skipped for the following reason.
```
[2024/05/25 20:30:59.605 +08:00] [WARN] [peer.rs:4519] ["skip proposal"] [error_code=KV:Raftstore:Unknown] [err="Other(\"[components/raftstore/src/store/peer.rs:4213]: log gap too large, skip merge: matched: 0, committed: 0, last index: 71, last_snapshot: 68\")"] [peer_id=606] [region_id=163] [thread_id=83]
```

here is the pd log:
```
[2024/05/25 20:06:54.688 +08:00] [INFO] [operator_controller.go:510] ["add operator"] [region-id=163] [operator="\"merge-region {merge: region 163 to 167} 
```

comments_data.body: The issue has not been reproduced recently. We need to collect more metrics and logs in details that could provide insights into the root causes.
